snippet: Hockey is popular among adults in Chicago, where new students in their middle years hold so many games that some have to play past midnight.
abstract: Ice hockey classes offered at Johnny's Icehouse in Chicago have become so popular that there is a waiting list, even though the venue has added to the class schedule; the popularity of hockey skyrocketed in the wake of the Chicago Blackhawks Stanley Cup victory in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Hockey is popular among adults in Chicago, where new students in their middle years hold so many games that some have to play past midnight.

headline.seo: Ice Hockey Is Thriving Among Adults in Chicago
headline.main: In Chicago, the Boys (and Girls) of Winter
headline.print_headline: In Chicago, the Boys (and Girls) of Winter
